keyMoments.title: Luffy Captured by Spider Webs
keyMoments.description: Luffy is bound and suspended by spider web strings in Moria's chamber, unable to escape as he's set up for shadow extraction.
keyMoments.significance: A rare moment of complete powerlessness for Luffy, setting up his devastating defeat.

keyMoments.title: Clash of Dreams with Moria
keyMoments.description: Luffy defiantly declares he will become Pirate King in response to Moria revealing the same ambition.
keyMoments.significance: Even in captivity, Luffy maintains his unwavering resolve and challenges the villain's dreams.
keyMoments.quote: I'm gonna be King of the Pirates!

keyMoments.title: Luffy's Shadow Stolen
keyMoments.description: Moria successfully cuts and steals Luffy's shadow using his Kage Giri technique, leaving Luffy unconscious and vulnerable to sunlight.
keyMoments.significance: A devastating turning point where Luffy loses something fundamental. One of the protagonist's most significant defeats in the series.

reveals.information: Loses his shadow to Gecko Moria, making him vulnerable to sunlight

keyMoments.title: Brook Defeats Tararan
keyMoments.description: Brook defeats the giant spider-monkey zombie using Hanauta Sancho: Yahazu Giri combined with salt purification.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Brook's combat abilities and his knowledge of zombie weaknesses.
keyMoments.quote: All you need to make a zombie is a body and a shadow.

keyMoments.title: Explains Zombie Creation Mechanics
keyMoments.description: Brook provides crucial information to Robin and Franky about how Moria's zombies work, explaining the shadow-stealing process and collaboration with Hogback.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Brook as a vital source of strategic information due to his previous encounter with Thriller Bark five years ago.
keyMoments.quote: All you need to make a zombie is a body and a shadow.

keyMoments.title: Reveals Salt Purification Weakness
keyMoments.description: Brook teaches the Straw Hats that salt can be used to purify zombies and force shadows to return to their original masters.
keyMoments.significance: Provides a crucial strategic advantage for the Straw Hats in fighting the zombie army.

abilities.description: A slash at such fast pace that it appears Brook did not attack at all, and only when he walks away does the opponent realize they've been cut. Used with salt to purify zombies.

reveals.information: Brook encountered Thriller Bark five years ago, which is why he has detailed knowledge of Moria's operations

keyMoments.title: Reveals Pirate King Ambition
keyMoments.description: Moria declares his intention to become Pirate King using his zombie army, directly challenging Luffy's dream.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the ideological conflict between Moria's shortcut approach and Luffy's direct pursuit of dreams.

keyMoments.title: Demonstrates Kage Giri Technique
keyMoments.description: Moria reveals his shadow-cutting technique, producing giant scissors to physically sever shadows from their owners.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of how Moria steals shadows, establishing the visual method of his Devil Fruit power.

keyMoments.title: Successfully Steals Luffy's Shadow
keyMoments.description: Moria cuts and steals Luffy's shadow, rendering the Straw Hat captain vulnerable to sunlight and unconscious.
keyMoments.significance: Major victory for Moria that demonstrates his power as a Warlord and creates the arc's central crisis.

keyMoments.title: Announces Ultimate Special Zombie Plan
keyMoments.description: Moria declares his plan to create the Ultimate Special Zombie using Luffy's shadow worth 300,000,000 in fighting power.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up the major threat for upcoming episodes and foreshadows the Oars conflict.
keyMoments.quote: With 300,000,000 in fighting power, I'll create the Ultimate Special Zombie!

abilities.description: Moria manifests giant scissors to physically cut and steal shadows from their owners. The stolen shadows can then be implanted into corpses to create zombies.

reveals.information: Moria wants to become Pirate King using his zombie army
Can use Kage Giri technique with giant scissors to cut and steal shadows

keyMoments.title: Learns About Zombie Mechanics
keyMoments.description: Robin listens as Brook explains how Moria's zombie creation process works, gaining strategic knowledge.
keyMoments.significance: Robin gains understanding of the enemy's powers that will be useful in future encounters.

keyMoments.title: Learns About Zombie Mechanics
keyMoments.description: Franky receives critical information from Brook about how the Thriller Bark zombies are created and their weaknesses.
keyMoments.significance: Gains strategic knowledge that will help the crew combat the zombie army.

keyMoments.title: Watches Helplessly from Kumashi
keyMoments.description: Hidden inside the zombie bear Kumashi with Usopp and Chopper, Nami is forced to watch in horror as Moria steals Luffy's shadow without being able to intervene.
keyMoments.significance: Creates tension as the Straw Hats are unable to help their captain in his moment of need.

keyMoments.title: Watches Helplessly from Kumashi
keyMoments.description: Hidden with Nami and Chopper inside Kumashi, Usopp witnesses Moria stealing Luffy's shadow but cannot intervene without revealing their presence.
keyMoments.significance: Emphasizes the crew's vulnerable position and inability to save their captain.

name.japanese: トニートニー・チョッパー

keyMoments.title: Watches Helplessly from Kumashi
keyMoments.description: Along with Nami and Usopp, Chopper is forced to witness Luffy's shadow being stolen while hiding inside Kumashi.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's helplessness and the severity of their situation on Thriller Bark.
